sense.gloss: to polish, to shine, to burnish, to scour, to scrub, to brush (teeth), to grind (e.g. a lens)
to refine (a skill, etc.), to improve, to hone, to polish (up), to cultivate (one's character)
refining (a skill, knowledge, etc.), applying oneself (to study), disciplining oneself
diligent application (to work or study), cultivating one's character by studying hard
mutual encouragement (to improve), working hard together, friendly rivalry
Harima (former province located in the southwestern part of present-day Hyōgo Prefecture)

sdata.j: ↑靴↑↓くつ↓をよく↑磨↑↓みが↓いてくれ。
sdata.e: Give my shoes a good shine.

sdata.j: ↑靴↑↓くつ↓をブラシで↑磨↑↓みが↓く↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓がある。↑泥↑↓どろ↓で↑汚↑↓よご↓れているから。
sdata.e: Your shoes need brushing. They are muddy.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓は↑読書↑↓どくしょ↓の↑技能↑↓ぎのう↓を↑磨↑↓みが↓くべきだ。
sdata.e: Students should develop their reading skills.

sdata.j: ↑外出↑↓がいしゅつ↓の↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑必↑↓かなら↓ず↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑磨↑↓みが↓きなさい。
sdata.e: Don't forget to polish your shoes before you go out!

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓へ↑出↑↓で↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑磨↑↓みが↓きなさい。
sdata.e: Shine your shoes before going out.

sdata.j: ↑会話↑↓かいわ↓↑力↑↓りょく↓に↑磨↑↓みが↓きをかけるため、↑彼↑↓かれ↓はフランスに↑行↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: He went to France to brush up on his speaking ability.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓にせめて↑二↑↓に↓↑回↑↓かい↓は↑歯↑↓は↓を↑磨↑↓みが↓くべきだ。
sdata.e: You should brush your teeth at least twice a day.

sdata.j: ロンドン↑滞在↑↓たいざい↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓に↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑英語↑↓えいご↓の↑腕↑↓うで↓を↑磨↑↓みが↓いた。
sdata.e: He brushed up his English during his stay in London.

sdata.j: パーティーに↑行↑↓い↓く↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑磨↑↓みが↓くべきですよ。
sdata.e: You should polish your shoes before you go to the party.

sdata.j: どんなに↑眠↑↓ねむ↓くても、↑歯↑↓は↓は↑磨↑↓みが↓きなさい。
sdata.e: Brush your teeth, however sleepy you are.

words.gloss: to polish, to shine, to burnish, to scour, to scrub, to brush (teeth), to grind (e.g. a lens)
